formErrors.genericText: There were some errors with your submission. Please correct them and try again.

completed.title: Exam Completed
completed.content: You have completed the English exam.
completed.expiredText: The time to complete the exam has expired.

inProgress.title: English Exam
inProgress.missingAnswerText: You must select an answer for this question.

start.title: Start your English Exam
start.content: When the exam begins, you will have 15 minutes to complete it. Make sure you have a stable internet connection and a quiet environment to focus. Good luck!
